title: Micromax IN Note 2 (Black, 64 GB)  (4 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Charger, Data Cable, Screen Guard, SIM Ejector Tool, TPU Case, User Manual
product_specification.Operating Frequency: 2G GSM: B2/3/5/8, 3G WCDMA: B1/5/8, 4G FDD: B1/B3/B5/B8, 4G TDD: B40/B41
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Quad Rear Camera Setup: 48MP + 5MP + 2MP + 2MP, Features: Panorama, Burst Mode, Time Lapse, Face Beauty, Night Mode, Slow motion, QR Code Scanner, Pro Mode
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 16MP Front Camera, Features: Face Beauty, Night Mode, Portrait Mode
product_specification.Flash: Rear - LED Flash | Front - Screen Flash
product_specification.Other Features: 30W Charger, Side Mounted Fingerprint Scanner, Face Unlock, Quick Charging Version PE5+
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty for Handset and 6 Months for Accessories

product_description.Glass Finish Design: The Micromax IN Note 2 mobile phone features a glass finish design on its back along with shining shades on its body to offer an elegant look on the device. Also, the mobile phone comes with a lightweight and sleek design, so that you can use it with comfort and ease.
product_description.Magnificent Display: This mobile features a 16.33 cm (6.43) AMOLED display, along with an aspect ratio of 20:9 to ensure a stunning visual experience. Also, it comes with a Corning Gorilla Glass so that your phone remains protected from minor drops and scratches.
product_description.Monstrous Battery: This mobile phone is equipped with a 5000 mAh battery that lets you connect with your loved ones, enjoy up to 18 hours of video streaming, and up to 180 hours of music playback without worrying about the battery running out.
product_description.Geared up Performance: This smartphone is powered by a powerful MediaTek Helio G95 processor with liquid cooling technology that allows you to enjoy seamless multitasking and high-end gaming while streaming video, chatting with your friends, working on the go, or clicking pictures.
product_description.Rapid Charging: Boasting the 30 W Fast Charging feature, this mobile allows you to charge your phone instantly using a USB Type-C cable when you find yourself running out of battery. So you can enjoy a blazing charge of up to 50% in just 25 minutes.
product_description.Easy Fingerprint Sensor: Thanks to the side-mounted fingerprint sensor, you can effortlessly unlock and access your mobile phone without looking at your phone.
product_description.Seamless User Experience: This mobile phone comes with Stock Android 11 OS upgrade so that you can enjoy a smooth user experience.
product_description.Stunning Captures: You can capture the appealing landscape around you, as this smartphone comes with a 48 MP (AI) quad-camera. Also, this mobile phone comes with a 16 MP front camera so that you can conveniently click stunning selfies.

review: A rich feel and a super stock-android experience; loved it's ease of use on both hardware and UI. Charges real fast but without getting heated-up; I would call it COOL super-fast-charging 😊 👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼👍👍👍

Nice Phone Thanks micromax its clear stock android and made in india so i liked .. the display if far better than realme GT master edition ... You can go for it perfect combination.

Nice handy phone,
initial impression:

what seems good:
----------------------------
-Glass back makes it feel premium
-AMOLED screen is nice
-handy in comparison to other other phones (as it is ~74mm wide)
-support 5Ghz wifi band
-stock android, no advertisement like other Mi or Realme or even Samsung mobiles in the same range
-mobile can be made multi-user (just like laptop)
-nice battery backup.
-user interface is fast like, opening menu or apps

what don't seems good:
---------------------------
-very stock android, very less customisation is available
-no app lock feature
-battery % is not clearly visible
-Dark mode is not exactly black, it is greyish. However drop down menu is deep black, so UI doesn't feels synchronised.
-cannot remove Google search bar from home screen

not fond of:
----------------------—----------
-The screen flicker in Light mode of brightness is reduced below certain level. You can mitigate it by enabling Dark mode, as you'll not notice it further. (or it might goes off after someday of use, can't say)
-Camera shutter speed is quite slow.
-something is missing in screen, colors are bit more saturated.

Can't say right now about:
-----------------------------------------
-shooting video
-location accuracy

Man What A great device.
In hand feel absolutely super
Camera in day gorgeous
In night lol
Battery performance : damn long you will take it for a day
Charging - super powerful 0-100, 1 hr and 10 minutes
Display : dude it's colours feels natural more brighter and so much
Performance : in this price, common it's definitely crazyy!!

That's all it's sexy shiny not so big. There fore 100 percent recommended.

Overall a great product really enjoying it.. really fast fingerprint sensor...great looks, nice performance haven't got any lag till now.. really nice battery backup.. have just a few dips.. like no app lock facility, bit of red tint in display at low brightness.... also visible in camera pics and videos..no long screenshot facility.. screen mirroring process is complicated... Requesting micromax to solve these issues via update as soon as possible.

Review after a week!

A great mobile at this price 💯 I'd recommend this mobile for average users...

Features like.. super-screenshot, call recording/auto-call recording are not included.

Then on camera.. update is required...
Rear:
Yellowish shades in the background..
4x zoom only (expected 8x)... And image is broken when it's zoomed...
Can't run HDR and flash light at the same time...
No 360° view in panorama mode.

Video:
Yellow colors in 30 fps for both 720p and 1080p...
But it's better at 4k and 60fps.

Selfie:
Lack of sharpness and zooming.

By camera - In note 1 is better than In note 2

Battery backup is great! It lasts more than a day..
30W fast charging is amazing.. but heating issue while charging.
Display is awesome!
No carrier aggregation. I can't find it anywhere..

Overall it's a classy product with rich look.
Love Micromax 💞
Waiting for the updates... Fix them and give ASAP.

Excellent offering by an Indian company finally to take on its Chinese rivals. Brilliant screen display, fairly decent processor (fairly good antutu and Geekbench single & multi core scores), 5000mAh battery with 33W (11*3) fast charging and an AMOLED display at this price range is truly amazing. Getting it on the day of the sale at a special introductory price made it even more sweeter. And 2 day delivery by ever reliable Flipkart made it a worth buy.

Pros.
1- Good Design
2- Good Audio quality
3- Good processor 👍
Cons.
1- Battery drains very fast not as expected
Don't use always on display otherwise mobile will switch of automatically 😄
My battery was 12% at night 11:00 pm and I applied AOD and after 4 hours mobile got switched off.
2- Cheap quality AMOLED Display. Not comparable with samsung display. My friend is using samsung m21 whose cost is 12000 and Micromax display is not comparable with samsung AMOLED display. Micromax AMOLED 👎
3- Build Quality is not strong
4- Major problem is there is no call recording provided by Micromax
5- Over saturated photography. Camera is not as expected.
Far difference between samsung 48 megapixel and Micromax 48 megapixel 👎

Finally I can say not value for money. Again Micromax disappointed me.
